description: Plan generation prompt template exists and contains required placeholder
plan_ref: Task 1 - Create Plan Generation Prompt Template
steps: Step 1: Check that prompts/plan-generation.md exists
Step 2: Verify file contains {{FEATURE_REQUEST}} placeholder
Step 3: Verify file requests JSON output format

description: Plan consolidation prompt template exists and contains required placeholders
plan_ref: Task 2 - Create Plan Consolidation Prompt Template
steps: Step 1: Check that prompts/plan-consolidation.md exists
Step 2: Verify file contains {{PLAN_1}}, {{PLAN_2}}, {{PLAN_3}} placeholders
Step 3: Verify file contains {{FEATURE_REQUEST}} placeholder
Step 4: Verify file requests JSON output format with sub-issues
Step 1: Check that package.json exists
Step 2: Verify @opencode-ai/sdk dependency is present
Step 3: Verify @linear/sdk dependency is present
Step 4: Run npm install and verify it succeeds

description: Plan generation script exists and has correct structure
steps: Step 1: Check that scripts/generate-plan.js exists
Step 2: Verify script imports OpenCode SDK
Step 3: Verify script imports Linear SDK
Step 4: Verify script has parallel plan generation logic
Step 5: Verify script has Linear issue creation logic
Step 6: Run syntax check: node --check scripts/generate-plan.js

description: GitHub Actions workflow exists and is properly configured
steps: Step 1: Check that .github/workflows/generate-plan.yml exists
Step 2: Verify workflow triggers on issues with label
Step 3: Verify workflow has workflow_dispatch trigger with issue_number input
Step 4: Verify workflow references all required secrets
Step 5: Verify workflow sets up Node.js
Step 6: Verify workflow runs the generate-plan.js script

description: README.md documents the new plan generation feature
steps: Step 1: Check README.md for plan generation section
Step 2: Verify all required secrets are documented
Step 3: Verify setup instructions are present
Step 4: Verify Linear integration is documented

description: Workflow file is valid YAML and references existing actions correctly
steps: Step 1: Parse YAML to verify it is valid
Step 2: Verify get-issue-details action is referenced correctly
Step 3: Verify all job dependencies are correct

description: Script can be executed with Node.js without runtime errors
steps: Step 1: Install dependencies with npm install
Step 2: Run node --check scripts/generate-plan.js
Step 3: Verify script handles missing environment variables gracefully
